.. This file contains commonly used link targets and name substitutions.

.. _Sphinx: http://sphinx.pocoo.org/
.. _`Sphinx reST`: http://sphinx.pocoo.org/rest.html
.. _ReStructuredText: http://docutils.sf.net/rst.html

.. _Virtualenv: http://pypi.python.org/pypi/virtualenv
.. _Git: http://git.or.cz/

.. _NumPy: http://www.scipy.org/NumPy
.. _SciPy: http://www.scipy.org
.. _iPython: http://ipython.scipy.org

.. _ETS: http://code.enthought.com/projects/tool-suite.php
.. _`Enthought Tool Suite`: http://code.enthought.com/projects/tool-suite.php
.. _`Enthought Python Distribution`: https://www.enthought.com/products/epd.php
.. _Python: http://www.python.org
.. _Setuptools: http://peak.telecommunity.com/DevCenter/setuptools

.. _CVXOPT: http://abel.ee.ucla.edu/cvxopt/
.. _PyBrain: http://www.pybrain.org
.. _MATPOWER: http://www.pserc.cornell.edu/matpower/
.. _PSAT: http://www.power.uwaterloo.ca/~fmilano/psat.htm
.. _ReStructuredText: http://docutils.sf.net/rst.html
.. _Traits: http://code.enthought.com/projects/traits/
.. _TraitsGUI: http://code.enthought.com/projects/traits_gui/
.. _Chaco: http://code.enthought.com/projects/chaco/
.. _Godot: http://www.github.com/rwl/godot/
.. _Envisage: http://code.enthought.com/projects/envisage/
.. _Graphviz: http://www.graphviz.org/
.. _Pyparsing: http://pyparsing.wikispaces.com/
.. _wxPython: http://www.wxpython.org/
